string.text: NLC-7 "I Am the Marked One" is a modification for the game "S.T.A.L.K.E.R. – Shadow of Chernobyl" by GSC
Author and lead developer of the entire NLC 6–7 project
The following people worked on the project for a long time and with great dedication:
The following people took part directly in the work, development, refinement, initial testing, and also provided ideas, advice, suggestions, and inspiration to the author:
As well as numerous testers of the first wave of closed beta testing:
The following person introduced their own ideas, fixes, and additions\nwithout coordination with the author:
Special thanks go to the former GSC company and the former AMK team.

Also:


AI-Pack by xStream
SkyGRAPHICS-MOD v2.0 RC4.1 by Sky4CE
Photozone by Argus
Photoliveliness by Argus and Domestos
Stories Revival Mod v.0.6 by Red75
Stalker’s Sound Remake v.4.0 by MulleR and Монгол
Artifact containers by the ARC team
Breakable light bulbs by macron1
Mined stashes by frag
Weather mod for AMK by NightVz
Ambient from AAO 1.8
Arsenal Mod by Dester
The NLC 3.9.1 build was prepared for you by: Sn1ck, waylander, Oruzheynik

The following people worked on NLC Improved:

Manool — port to OGSR, engine, configs, scripts
Sn1ck — engine, configs, scripts, quests
Voskresensky — work on locations
VeNoMMaNs — work on locations
waylander — configs, icons, weather refinement


 Special thanks to:

OGSR Engine developers: xrSimpodin, dsh2dsh, joye-ramone, and others
Improved Weapon Pack developers: ROOZBAN, _V_O_IN_, Valerok, Misery, OldSerpskiStalker, Vyacheslav Mainov
CGIM 2 developer: Zhora Cementov
Works by authors used: dsh, alpet, naxac, PavelBlend, moof1x, KD, Sleep
Assets from mods used: OGSR GA, DSH mod, Anomaly
